title: My Husband Isn't Supporting Our Family Anymore
description:
Amanda's husband is holding on to his job in a failing company, and she is frustrated and losing respect over having to support them financially. - Dr. Laura: "A marital partnership is about give and take."

Has there been a time that you felt you carried more than your fair share of the responsibilities in your marriage? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:

Facebook.com/DrLaura

Instagram.com/DrLauraProgram

Twitter.com/DrLauraProgram

YouTube.com/DrLaura

Become a Dr. Laura Family Member: https://www.drlaura.com/ See https://www.drlaura.com/privacy-policy for privacy information.
